page.title: 02LOCHGOILHEAD-TOURISM(1)
page.content: Tourism is important in the life of Lochgoilhead.Many people have jobs related,directly and indirectly,to tourism.Lochgoilhead has much to offer tourists (whether a day visitor or staying longer) not least being the scenery. The choice of accommodation varies from hotels to caravans.Some hardy souls camp out braving the dreaded midge. The hills are excellent for mountaineering or hillwalking.The inexperienced can follow the carefully signposted routes of varying distances. Naturalists will enjoy the diverse variety of flora and fauna.A surprising amount of wildlife can be seen on a pleasant walk through the village.
